name: Telephonetic
description:
Telephonetic is an audio game where you take on the role of the telephone operator at Motel Nowhere, the game has no visuals and can be played entirely with space and numpad (or on screen buttons)

Controls:

  • Space Bar To Pick Up
  • NumPad 0 (Basement) to 5 (Attic)

Connect all the calls correctly, or get fired!
